title: Men Don't Cry Part-2 | Tomato Crisis India
selftext:
Recently, Lallantop had covered vegetable vendor Rameswar in Delhi who was unable to make ends meet, specially due to rising Tomato prices. His story received a lot of attention when he was trying very hard to control his tears on camera. (Original Post attached)

Surprisingly, he recently sat down with Rahul Gandhi for a chat, talking about his struggles and family.

Even though I agree there is definitely a political angle here with RaGa's involvement but I'm happy that his story reached out to the people.

Original Post - https://www.reddit.com/r/delhi/comments/15mbdqu/men_dont_cry_tomato_crisis_india_the_lallantop/ 

Source : Rahul Gandhi YouTube Channel ( https://youtu.be/kxO2XGgRRF4)
